doc:
Beth Howland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beth_Howland 0 Elizabeth "Beth" Howland (May 28, 1941 – December 31, 2015) was an American actress. She worked on stage and television, and was best known for playing Vera Gorman in Alice, the sitcom inspired by the Martin Scorsese film Alice Doesn't Live Here Anymore (1974).Howland originated the role of Amy in the original Broadway cast of Stephen Sondheim's Company, in which she introduced the patter song "Getting Married Today". Elizabeth_"_Beth_"_Howland ( May_28_,_1941 – December_31_,_2015 ) was an_American_actress . She worked on stage_and_television , and was_best_known for playing Vera_Gorman in Alice , the_sitcom inspired by the_Martin_Scorsese_film_Alice Does_n't_Live Here_Anymore (_1974_) . Howland originated the_role of Amy in the_original_Broadway_cast of Stephen_Sondheim 's_Company , in which she introduced the_patter_song " Getting Married_Today_" .
